name: Midsummer House
description: Cambridge's only two-Michelin-starred restaurant set in an elegant Victorian villa overlooking Midsummer Common. Chef Daniel Clifford creates exceptional modern British cuisine with innovative techniques and the finest seasonal ingredients.
reviewSummary: Two Michelin stars represent the pinnacle of Cambridge dining, where Daniel Clifford's innovative modern British cuisine reaches extraordinary heights.

spotlight.title: Cambridge's Culinary Crown Jewel
spotlight.excerpt: Two Michelin stars shine bright in this Victorian villa restaurant.
spotlight.introduction: Midsummer House represents the absolute pinnacle of Cambridge's dining scene.

sections.heading: Michelin Excellence
content: Two Michelin stars showcase culinary mastery
Innovative modern British cuisine with seasonal focus

spotlight.finalVerdict: An extraordinary dining experience that justifies its legendary reputation.
spotlight.author: Cambridge Guide

name: Restaurant Alimentum
description: An award-winning fine dining restaurant offering modern European cuisine with creative presentation. Known for its innovative approach to seasonal British ingredients and exceptional service.
reviewSummary: Award-winning fine dining that showcases the very best of modern European cuisine with creative British influences.

name: Cambridge Chop House
description: A traditional English chophouse serving the finest British beef, game, and seasonal produce. Located in the heart of Cambridge with views of King's College Chapel, offering classic British dining.
reviewSummary: Traditional English chophouse dining with unbeatable views of King's College Chapel and exceptional British cuisine.

name: Fitzbillies
description: A Cambridge institution since 1922, famous for their legendary Chelsea buns and traditional afternoon tea. Also serves modern British cuisine in a charming historic setting.
reviewSummary: A beloved Cambridge institution where legendary Chelsea buns meet traditional afternoon tea in historic surroundings.
